  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770203346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Inside Cancer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Innerer Krebs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cancer Intérieur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cancer Interno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cancer Interno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εσωτερικός καρκίνος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cáncer Interior</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Hallmarks of cancer, causes and preventions, diagnoses and treatment are explained.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stempel des Krebses, der Ursachen und der 
Verhinderungen, der Diagnosen und der Behandlung werden erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des cachets du cancer, les causes et les 
empêchements, les diagnostics et le traitement sont expliqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os hallmarks do cancer, as causas e as 
prevenções, os diagnósticos e o tratamento são explicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli marchi di garanzia di cancro, cause e 
prevenzioni, diagnosi e trattamento sono spiegati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σφραγίδες του καρκίνου, των αιτιών και των 
προλήψεων, των διαγνώσεων και της θεραπείας εξηγούνται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los sellos del cáncer, las causas y las 
prevenciones, las diagnosis y tratamiento se explican.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
